title: An Emergency
description: Edward Zero was the best spy the Agency had—and then he realized he was working for the wrong side.Collecting: Zero 1-5"A first issue is the buy in of the great game, story. This is Zero, and it's where all the action is. Have a seat." —Jonathan Hickman (The Manhattan Projects, East of West)"With Zero, Kot continues to push boundaries of both form and content to stunning and inspiring effect. A new kind of spy thriller written with scope, intelligence and flat out gripping storytelling, Zero is easily one of my favorite reads of the year." —Scott Snyder (Severed, Batman)
author: Aleš Kot
